name: Sujoy Bhore
content: Sujoy BhoreSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationHello, I am Sujoy! ... I am a faculty member in the Department of Computer Science & Engineering at the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Bombay and an associated faculty member at the Center for Machine Intelligence and Data Science (C-MInDS) and IIT Bombay Trust Lab. I am a visiting fellow in the Department of Mathematics at the London School of Economics.Research InterestsAlgorithms, Discrete & Computational Geometry, Combinatorial Optimization, Theoretical Machine Learning. Open PositionsPostdoctoral opportunities: You are welcome to contact me to discuss your research interests.Ph.D. Positions: If you are a highly motivated student with a strong mathematical background, please check [this link] for details.Other Interests3Ps: Painting, Photography, Poetry ..."Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known!"... Google SitesReport abuseGoogle SitesReport abuse
